translation.en: [woman] They say that when you die,
translation.zh: 据说 濒临死亡之时

translation.en: your life flashes before your eyes.
translation.zh: 人一生的经历会在眼前一闪而过
一台收集特殊时刻的点唱机…

translation.en: Bring your awareness to your breath.
translation.zh: 把注意力集中到意识上

translation.en: …collected together to remind you of all the incredible things…
translation.zh: …集中精神提醒自己生命所能给予的…
还有处于两者之间的一切

translation.en: [woman] If you could control that flashback
translation.zh: 如果你能控制那份死亡回放

translation.en: and live in the moment again…
Something is up. You know I can always tell with you.
translation.zh: 有什么不对劲 你知道的你要是有事 我一眼就能看出来

translation.en: What… what do you mean "seeing something?"
translation.zh: 你说“看到幻象”是什么意思？

translation.en: It's always vague and in my periphery.
translation.zh: 总是很模糊 我无法碰触

translation.en: He was this thing when we were growing up.
translation.zh: 我们小时候 经常玩这个玩具 它…

translation.en: This… this, like, vulture skull creature, and--
translation.zh: 我们小时候 经常玩这个玩具 它… 是一个长着秃鹫头颅的怪兽 而且…

translation.en: No. You're right. You're right. It sounds mad.
translation.zh: 不 你说得对 听起来很疯狂

translation.en: Well, saying it out loud, it does sound a bit crazy.
translation.zh: 好吧 大声说出来听起来的确有点疯狂

translation.en: Uh, tell me again why we have, uh, Vulture Man in here every night.
translation.zh: 再告诉我一次秃鹫为何每晚都要陪我们

translation.en: and he makes me feel safe.
I thought that was my job.
translation.zh: 我就不能给你安全感吗？

translation.en: Well, every hero needs a sidekick.
translation.zh: 每个英雄都需要一个跑腿

translation.en: [both] ♪ He's on your street, and he's in your home, sound the alarm ♪
translation.zh: 他在你所处的街道上 在你的家中敲响警钟
-他就是骨医生-他就是骨医生

translation.en: [in funny voice] Time to wake up!
Get off. God, you're such a kid.
translation.zh: 拿开 天哪 你真是孩子气
好吧 可以把这个娃娃留下来

translation.en: -And you know that tatty old thing with… -[gasping] Rude.
translation.zh: -你知道那个破玩意…-真没礼貌

translation.en: Well, it would actually look much nicer in a… in a nursery
translation.zh: 把这玩意放在托儿所里 跟其他不那么可怕的玩具在一起看起来会好很多

translation.en: surrounded by some other slightly less terrifying toys,
translation.zh: 跟其他不那么可怕的玩具在一起看起来会好很多
你知道我做好心理准备了

translation.en: I love you more than chips.
translation.zh: 我爱你 胜过爱薯片

translation.en: [Jess] And if it finally gets you to decorate that spare room,
translation.zh: 如果这样做能让你终于答应装饰那间空房

translation.en: -I have to ask you something, actually. -[Jess] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 事实上 我有件事要问你

translation.en: If you wanna be Dr. Bones' sidekick, you're gonna have to prove yourself.
translation.zh: 如果你想当骨医生的跑腿就得证明自己

translation.en: All right, look, if I'm not back in five minutes,
translation.zh: 好吧 听着 如果我五分钟后不回来

translation.en: -I didn't mean it. He just came at me. -Scott?
translation.zh: -我不是故意的 他向我扑过来-斯科特？

translation.en: I need to find Scott. Warn him.
translation.zh: 我要找到斯科特 警告他

translation.en: Jess, you having a good birthday, love? Go follow your friends.
translation.zh: 洁西 亲爱的过生日过得很快乐吧？去找朋友玩
不 爸爸 我中枪了！

translation.en: You haven't started. How've you been shot already?
translation.zh: 你还没开始呢 你是怎么被枪杀的？

translation.en: Someone broke into the apartment. Scott is dead! And they shot me!
translation.zh: 有人闯进了公寓斯科特死了！他们还朝我开枪！

translation.en: Gross. Jess, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 真恶心 洁西 你在干什么？

translation.en: I… I just saw you dead!
You have to stay away from me!
In twelve years' time, we work together at a local gym.
translation.zh: 12年后 我们一起在当地一家健身房工作

translation.en: You as a PT and me as a yoga instructor.
translation.zh: 你是私教 我是瑜伽教练

translation.en: It's my 25th birthday and all my friends forget
translation.zh: 是我25岁生日 我的朋友们都忘了

translation.en: so you take me to the worst Italian place in the city,
translation.zh: 所以你带我去城里最烂那家意式餐厅

translation.en: and we eat spaghetti bolognese like Lady and the Tramp.
translation.zh: 我们吃了意面像《小姐与流浪汉》里面那样

translation.en: -What are you talking about, Jess? -I get wine drunk.
translation.zh: -你在说什么 洁西？-我喝醉了

translation.en: Slip and hurt my ankle. You offer to drive me home, and I accept.
translation.zh: 滑倒了 我的脚踝受伤你提出送我回家 我答应了

translation.en: You carry me all the way to my door, and it's the third-floor apartment.
translation.zh: 你把我一路背到门口 我家在三楼

translation.en: You're so tired you end up passed out on my sofa
translation.zh: 你累到不行结果在Netflix上看《办公室》时

translation.en: In the morning, we have breakfast,
and you tell me you've liked me since we were 13.
translation.zh: 你告诉我 你从我们13岁起就喜欢我了

translation.en: So you'll have to promise me you'll do what I say.
translation.zh: 所以你得答应我 你会照我说的做

translation.en: [woman] Battle commences in T-minus one minute.
translation.zh: 战斗将于一分钟后开始

translation.en: [Jess] I really need you to understand.
Maybe if we never get together, things will change.
translation.zh: 如果我们从未在一起事情或许就会改变

translation.en: [laughing] Jess, I didn't know there would be a Dr. Bones here as well.
translation.zh: 洁西 我不知道骨医生会来这里

translation.en: I need you to promise you'll never talk to me again.
translation.zh: 我需要你保证 你我从此绝交

translation.en: We can't get into a relationship. If we do, we both die.
translation.zh: 我们不能谈恋爱 否则我们都会没命

translation.en: -I believe you. I won't talk to you again. -Please.
translation.zh: -我相信你 我们从此绝交-求你了

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay, it's time.
I love you more than chips.
translation.zh: 我爱你 胜过爱薯片

translation.en: And if I'm not back in five minutes,
translation.zh: 如果我五分钟后不回来
控制你的呼吸 洁西

translation.en: for allowing you to practice today.
translation.zh: 感谢它们准许你今天参加练习

translation.en: [Jess] What if you could change the past?
translation.zh: 如果你能改变过去会怎样？

translation.en: [Jess] Avoid what went wrong the first time around?
translation.zh: 避免第一次会出现的问题？

translation.en: What if you're presented with an opportunity
translation.zh: 如果你有机会走另一条路

translation.en: Even if it leads to someone else's happy ending?
translation.zh: 即使这条路会让其他人拥有幸福结局？

translation.en: I've got all the time in the world to find mine.
translation.zh: 我有的是时间可以找到我的幸福结局

translation.en: ♪ He's on your street And he's in your home ♪
translation.zh: 他在你所处的街道上 在你的家中
